devdoc.details: contract to create and interact with auctions

buyOut(uint256,(uint256,bytes4,bytes)).details: buyout auction if bid satisfies buyout condition

checkAuctionExistence(uint256).details: returns true if auction exists, false otherwise

checkAuctionRangeTime(uint256).details: returns true if auction started and hasn't finished yet, false otherwise

finishAuction(uint256).details: finishes, deletes and transfers all assets for an auction if it's ended (it exists, it has at least one bid, now > endTme)

getCurrentBuyer(uint256).details: returns current highest bidder for an auction

getMinimalNextBid(uint256).details: returns the minimal amount of the next bid (without fees)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

putBid(uint256,(uint256,bytes4,bytes)).details: put a bid and return locked assets for the last bid

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

startAuction(address,uint96,uint256,addr.details: creates an auction and locks sell asset

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFaultyBid(address).details: Used to withdraw faulty bids (bids that failed to return after out-bidding)
